events.title: One Republic The Artificial Paradise Tour
events.description:
VIETNAM – Midas Promotions, is thrilled to announce that OneRepublic, OneRepublic will be bringing their highly anticipated debut of “The Artificial Paradise Tour 2025” to Vietnam! The band will be electrifying the stage at the renowned Athletes Arena My Dinh – Hanoi on the 24th January 2025 and Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center – Ho Chi Minh City on 26th January 2025.

GRAMMY® nominated OneRepublic, is comprised of singer/songwriter and lead vocalist Ryan Tedder, guitarists Zach Filkins and Drew Brown, keys Brian Willett, bassist and cellist Brent Kutzle, and drummer Eddie Fisher. The band released their debut set Dreaming Out Loud in 2007. The release included the 20mm selling smash single “Apologize,” which shattered digital sales and airplay records worldwide and received a Grammy nomination. The band’s sophomore album, 2009’s Waking Up, produced the hit singles “All the Right Moves,” “Secrets” and “Good Life.” The certified-platinum album Native followed in 2013, featuring the No.1 hit and 41 million selling single “Counting Stars.”

OneRepublic released Oh My My, their fourth full-length album in 2016. OneRepublic has amassed 5B streams on Spotify to date. OneRepublic’s latest album, Human, dropped on August 27, 2021. It features singles, which combined have over 2.5 billion global streams: “Someday,” “Run,” “Somebody To Love,” “Wanted,” “Didn’t I,” “Better Days” and “Rescue Me.”

At the end of 2023, OneRepublic released “Dear Santa,” for the Holiday season. Earlier in the year, OneRepublic released “Runaway” and “Mirage (for Assassin’s Creed Mirage),” the first new tracks the band released since their smash hit, “I Ain’t Worried,” which was featured in the blockbuster hit, Top Gun: Maverick.

Most recently, OneRepublic released their sixth studio album- Artificial Paradise on July 12, 2024, featuring “I Don’t Wanna Wait” with David Guetta and “Nobody (from Kaiju No. 8),” which was written specifically for the ending theme of the anime “Kaiju No. 8.”

OneRepublic: The Artificial Paradise Tour 2025 is proudly supported by the Hanoi Opera House, which is managed by the Ministry of Culture, Sports, and Tourism.

Tickets for OneRepublic: The Artificial Paradise Tour 2025 at Athletes Arena My Dinh – Hanoi on 24th January 2025 and Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center – Ho Chi Minh City on 26th January 2025 will be available for purchase starting on 29 November 2024 at 12noon at ticketbox.vn.

For more information and updates, please follow OneRepublic and Midas Promotions on social media or visit the websites today.

VIỆT NAM – Midas Promotions tự hào công bố rằng OneRepublic sẽ lần đầu tiên mang tour diễn đầy hứa hẹn của họ, “The Artificial Paradise Tour 2025”, đến Việt Nam! Ban nhạc sẽ đốt cháy sân khấu tại Cung điền kinh Mỹ Đình, Hà Nội vào ngày 24 tháng 1 năm 2025, và tiếp tục tại Trung tâm Hội nghị và Triển lãm Sài Gòn (SECC), Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh vào ngày 26 tháng 1 năm 2025.

OneRepublic, ban nhạc từng nhận đề cử GRAMMY®, gồm có ca sĩ chính đồng thời cũng là nhạc sĩ Ryan Tedder, cùng các thành viên Zach Filkins (guitar), Drew Brown (guitar), Brian Willett (đàn phím), Brent Kutzle (bass và cello), và Eddie Fisher (trống). Ban nhạc đã ra mắt album đầu tay Dreaming Out Loud vào năm 2007, với đĩa đơn đình đám “Apologize” bán ra 20 triệu bản, phá vỡ kỷ lục toàn cầu về doanh thu kỹ thuật số và phát sóng, đồng thời nhận được đề cử Grammy. Tiếp nối là album Waking Up (2009) với các hit “All the Right Moves,” “Secrets,” và “Good Life”. Album Native (2013), đạt chứng nhận bạch kim, nổi bật với ca khúc No.1 “Counting Stars” đã bán ra 41 triệu bản.

OneRepublic phát hành album Oh My My vào năm 2016 và đã đạt hơn 5 tỷ lượt nghe trên Spotify tính đến nay. Album mới nhất của họ, Human, ra mắt vào ngày 27 tháng 8 năm 2021, với những đĩa đơn ấn tượng như “Someday,” “Run,” và “Rescue Me,” tổng cộng đã thu về hơn 2,5 tỷ lượt nghe toàn cầu.

Vào cuối năm 2023, OneRepublic đã phát hành ca khúc “Dear Santa” dành riêng cho mùa lễ hội. Trước đó, đầu năm, họ ra mắt các đĩa đơn “Runaway” và “Mirage” (nhạc nền cho trò chơi Assassin’s Creed Mirage), cùng với bản hit đình đám “I Ain’t Worried” từ bộ phim bom tấn Top Gun: Maverick.

Gần đây nhất, OneRepublic đã ra mắt album phòng thu thứ sáu của mình, Artificial Paradise, vào ngày 12 tháng 7 năm 2024. Album bao gồm ca khúc “I Don’t Wanna Wait” hợp tác cùng David Guetta và “Nobody (from Kaiju No. 8)”, được viết riêng cho bài hát kết thúc của bộ anime nổi tiếng Kaiju No. 8.

OneRepublic: The Artificial Paradise Tour 2025 vinh dự được phối hợp và hỗ trợ bởi Trung tâm Tổ chức Biểu diễn Nghệ thuật và Sự kiện Văn hóa – Nhà hát Lớn Hà Nội, trực thuộc Bộ Văn hóa, Thể thao và Du lịch.

Vé cho OneRepublic: The Artificial Paradise Tour 2025 tại Cung điền kinh Mỹ Đình, Hà Nội vào ngày 24 tháng 1 năm 2025 và Trung tâm Hội nghị và Triển lãm Sài Gòn (SECC), TP. Hồ Chí Minh vào ngày 26 tháng 1 năm 2025 sẽ chính thức mở bán từ [Ngày:…….] trên ticketbox.vn.

Để biết thêm thông tin và những cập nhật mới nhất, vui lòng theo dõi OneRepublic và Midas Promotions trên các kênh mạng xã hội hoặc truy cập website chính thức của họ.

events.title: The Script Satellites World Tour Singapore 2025
events.description:
After 10 billion streams, 12 million album sales, six UK #1 albums and two Platinum-certified US singles, Irish band, The Script will be back in Singapore for their SATELLITES WORLD TOUR on 8 February 2025 at the Indoor Stadium.

Glen Power says, we’re The Script, and now we have something to prove that there is life and light after the darkness.”

Vowing to pay tribute to their friend (Mark Sheehan) by continuing the band they had built together, vocalist Danny O’Donoghue returned to the studio and experimented in a number of ways. What emerged is ‘Satellites’, an utterly uplifting collection of songs that forges a new future for The Script while remembering that although Mark may no longer be here, he remains a vital part of everything that they do.

Danny explains, “The album cover is silhouettes of me, Glen and Ben Sargeant, our bassist.. Then we have a hooded silhouette, because the air of Mark is still there. He always will be, but it’s also giving a tip of the hat to the future. It’ll never be the same Script. We’re just trying to get on and do what it is that we all feel is the next right thing to do and that’s to keep making more great music.”

After reuniting for select shows of collective grieving and joyous communion with The Script family in 2023, the band is about to head out to big stages of their own. This will see them play to over 2 million fans around the world this year. The Script will be performing songs off their ‘Satellites’ album along with the biggest hits and fan favourites from their six studio albums.

Let’s all head out to the reunion!

Presale exclusively for DBS/POSB Cardmembers will be available between 29 August 2024 (Thursday), 11AM to 30 August 2024 (Friday), 11AM via sistic.com.sg and +65 6348 5555.

General Ticket Sales will follow on 30 August 2024 (Friday) at 12PM via sistic.com.sg and +65 6348 5555.

Ticket Prices are: $195 | $165 | $135 | $115
https://sistic.com.sg/events/scriptwt0225

events.title: The Script Satellites World Tour Malaysia 2025
events.description:
Irish Rock Legends THE SCRIPT Returns to Malaysia on February 9th for ‘Satellites’ World Tour

– Get Your Tickets Starting October 19th!

KUALA LUMPUR, 14 October 2024 – Get ready for an unforgettable night of soaring vocals, stunning visuals, and raw emotion as Irish rock legends THE SCRIPT are set to ignite the stage in Kuala Lumpur as part of their highly anticipated Satellites World Tour. Fans can catch their electrifying performance on Sunday, February 9th, 2025, at 8:00 PM at Mega Star Arena.

THE SCRIPT is a highly talented and versatile Irish rock band, renowned for their anthemic pop-rock sound and heartfelt lyrics. The close friendship and strong bond between the band members shines through in both their music and performances. Their songs are known for catchy melodies, driving rhythms, and powerful vocals, often exploring themes of love, loss, and personal growth.

With a massive global fanbase and their latest album, Satellites, released in August 2024, the band is poised to make a huge impact once again. This album serves as a heartfelt tribute to their late bandmate, Mark Sheehan, with cover art featuring the band alongside a hooded figure, symbolizing his enduring spirit. Lead vocalist Danny O’Donoghue reflects, “It’ll never be the same Script. We’re just trying to move forward and keep making more great music.”

The Satellites World Tour celebrates both the album and THE SCRIPT’s remarkable legacy, while looking ahead to an exciting future. Fans can expect to hear timeless hits like “Breakeven,” “The Man Who Can’t Be Moved,” “Hall of Fame,” and “Superheroes,” alongside new tracks like “Both Ways” and “At Your Feet.”

With over 10 billion streams, 12 million album sales, six UK #1 albums, and two Platinum-certified singles in the US, THE SCRIPT return bigger, bolder, and more passionate than ever.

Following their successful reunion shows in 2023, THE SCRIPT is embarking on their most ambitious tour to date, performing for over 2 million fans across North America, Europe, Australia, and Asia, with stops in Singapore, the Philippines, Indonesia, Thailand, and Malaysia. This will mark the band’s return to Malaysia since their memorable 2015 performance,

Expect intimate moments, high-energy performances, and surprises throughout the night. The Satellites World Tour promises a concert experience like no other, blending heart-stopping emotion with exhilarating energy. THE SCRIPT is ready to give their Malaysian fans an unforgettable night of music and memories.

Jointly organized by Midas Promotion and Star Planet, tickets for THE SCRIPT Satellites World Tour in Kuala Lumpur will go on sale starting 19 October 2024, at 12 PM via golive-asia.com. Tickets are priced from RM198 onwards. Don’t miss your chance to see THE SCRIPT live on 9 February 2025 – it’s set to be a night of music and memories that will last a lifetime! For more information , visit www.starplanet.com.my or www.midaspromotions.com -end-

events.title: The Corrs Talk On Corner Tour Bangkok
events.description:
THE CORRS – TALK ON CORNERS TOUR WILL HIT BANGKOK IN FEBRUARY 2025

Irish Celtic infused pop icons, The Corrs will be hitting Bangkok with their tour titled Talk On Corners Tour on 11 February 2025 at Paragon Hall, Siam Paragon.

The Corrs are Ireland’s first family of music, a multi-million selling sibling quartet who have conquered the world with a seamless blend of sleek pop rock, lush harmonies and Celtic folk trimmings. Comprising Andrea (lead vocals, piano, tin whistle), Sharon (violin, piano, vocals), Caroline (drums, piano, vocals) and Jim (guitar, keyboards, vocals), The Corrs have sold over 40 million albums since their debut Forgiven, Not Forgotten in 1995, spawning a dozen classic hit singles. An enchanting mix of traditional Celtic music with a pop rock twist, The Corrs have written some of the biggest songs of the last three decades. Forgiven, Not Forgotten gave us the incredible title track, the exquisite Heaven Knows and of course, arguably one of the biggest contemporary songs of the modern era, Runaway. Their second album, Talk On Corners led with I Never Loved You Anyway, So Young and Only When I Sleep and is their biggest selling album to date.

Performing tracks from the acclaimed album plus a selection of their greatest hits to fans during the tour, the multi-million selling sibling quartet will kick off the tour at Belfast’s SSE Arena before heading to Manchester’s AO Arena, Glasgow’s OVO Hydro and Newcastle’s Utilita Arena.

The tour announcement follows news that the band – whose biggest hits include Runaway, What Can I Do? And Breathless – are planning a first ever vinyl release of second studio album ‘Talk On Corners’, with more details to come.

Presented by Midas Promotions. The Corrs: Talk On Corners Tour will be held at Paragon Hall on Tuesday, 11 February 2025 (8:00pm).

Tickets will go on sale starting Friday 27 December at TH 12noon (GMT +7), available at www.thaiticketmajor.com .

For more information and updates, please follow The Corrs and Midas Promotions on social media or visit the websites today.

venue.address: Siam Paragon

events.title: Nick Carter World Tour Singapore 2025
events.description:
NICK CARTER ANNOUNCES EXTENSION OF “WHO I AM” WORLD TOUR TO SINGAPORE IN 2025

Beloved pop icon and Backstreet Boy, Nick Carter, is proud to announce the extension of his “Who I Am” tour to Singapore on 25 March 2025 at The Theatre at MediaCorp.

The “Who I Am” Tour, which has already completed successful legs in the United States, Canada, and South America, marks Carter’s return to the stage as a solo artist after seven years. Carter will also tour Asia and Europe, finishing up 2024 on a second leg in North America after his first successful run in 2023. The North America leg kicks off on September 26 in Carmel, IN.

For the upcoming concert dates, the singer-songwriter is set to perform tracks from his solo catalog – including his latest single releases “Never Break My Heart (Not Again),” “Made For Us,” and “Superman” – as well as Backstreet Boys favorites and other music hits with a personal significance to Carter.

Nick Carter Fan Club Presale will be available to fan club members on Thursday 12 Dec from 10:00am to 11:59pm and the public ticket sale begins on Friday 13 Dec 10:00am at SISTIC outlets, sistic.com.sg or call 6348 5555. VIP upgrade packages will be available for purchase via www.nickcarter.com.

For tickets, Exclusive VIP Packages, and additional information, please follow Nick Carter and Midas Promotions on social media or visit the websites today.
